get.summary: Fetch therapists with search and category filter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter therapists by name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

get.summary: Fetch the profile of the logged-in therapy center

parameters.name: brand_name
parameters.description: Brand name of the therapy center

parameters.name: contact_number
parameters.description: Contact number of the therapy center

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: Website URL of the therapy center

parameters.name: profile_image
parameters.description: Profile image of the therapy center

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the therapist category to update

delete.summary: Soft delete therapist category by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the therapist category to delete
